auth()

auth.php : 38

Authenticate a provided token into and return a valid PebbleAuthToken object

public auth(string $token[, array<string|int, mixed>|null $options = null ]) : PebbleAuthTokenInterface
Parameters
$token : string

Provided token

$options : array<string|int, mixed>|null = null

Verifying options. Acceptable claims : audience, issuer. Resource API MUST control its audience name.

Tags
throws
InvalidTypException
throws
InvalidClaimValueException
Return values
PebbleAuthTokenInterface

authFromHttpHeaders()

auth.php : 80

Authenticate user using the HTTP Authorization header provided with the request

public authFromHttpHeaders(array<string|int, mixed> $headers[, array<string|int, mixed>|null $options = null ]) : PebbleAuthTokenInterface

The Authorization headers must be written according to the standard :

  • Token content must start with "Bearer " string (ex : Bearer full_token_string)
Parameters
$headers : array<string|int, mixed>

All provided headers (including Authorization) in an array. Headers can be formatted according PSR7 getHeaders() recommendations.

$options : array<string|int, mixed>|null = null

Verifying options. Acceptable claims : audience, issuer. Resource API MUST control its audience name.

Tags
throws
AmbiguousTokenException
throws
EmptyTokenException
Return values
PebbleAuthTokenInterface

Parameters
$headers : array<string|int, mixed>

Input headers

Return values
array<string|int, mixed>

verifyClaimValue()

auth.php : 135

Verify one claim on a provided decoded token. If decoded token claim value is an array, verified value must exist once in the list.

private verifyClaimValue(stdClass $decodedToken, string $claim, mixed $value) : void
Parameters
$decodedToken : stdClass

Decoded token

$claim : string

Claim name that must be verified

$value : mixed

Expected value

Tags
throws
InvalidClaimValueException
throws
MissingClaimException

verifyTyp()

auth.php : 111

Check typ header claim of provided token.

private verifyTyp(string $token[, string $typ = "at+jwt" ]) : void
Parameters
$token : string

Input token to verify

$typ : string = "at+jwt"

Expected typ value (default at+jwt)

Tags
throws
InvalidTypException
